## FetchedAsset type

Asset with all the applicable source content files available on the local file system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FetchedAsset = ResolvedAsset & {
    content: FetchedContent;
    dirty?: boolean;
};
```
**References:** [ResolvedAsset](./imgit.resolvedasset.md)<!-- -->, [FetchedContent](./imgit.fetchedcontent.md)
